data.title: Find the  most distant ancestor
data.statement: In this challenge, players will embark on an adventurous journey through the family tree. Given a list of familial relationships represented as strings, your task is to identify the most ancient ancestor of a specified individual.

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
3
A => D,R,G
R => P,K
D => O,F
O
testCases.testOut: A is the most distant ancestor of O

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
3
A => D,G
R => K,A,E,N,M
D => O,F
O
testCases.testOut: R is the most distant ancestor of O

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn:
4
G => A,H
H => L,K,I
I => P
L => B,J,E
U
testCases.testOut: U not found in the tree

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
4
G => A,H
H => L,K,I,O,D,N,Q,M
I => P,J,X,Z
L => B,J,E
Y
testCases.testOut: Y not found in the tree

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn:
4
G => A,H
I => L,K,E
E => O,P,F
F => B,C
I

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
4
G => A,H
U => L,K,E,Q
E => O,P,F
F => C
U

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn:
6
F => A,B,C
R => E,F
A => P,Q,O
O => D,U,I,S
M => R,Z,X
B => J
S
testCases.testOut: M is the most distant ancestor of S

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
6
F => A,B,C
R => E,F
A => P,Q,O
O => D,U,I,S
M => R,Z,X
B => J
U
testCases.testOut: M is the most distant ancestor of U

data.constraints: Each individual is represented as a single uppercase letter
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read relation:string(200)
read p:string(200)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: an integer [[n]] for the number of relationships
<<Next [[n]] lines>>: a single relationship [[relation]], formatted as [[parent]] {{=>}} [[child1]]{{,}}...{{,}}[[childN]]
<<Next line>>:The name [[p]] of the person whose most distant ancestor we aim to find.
data.outputDescription:
<<{{[[ancestor]] is the most distant ancestor of [[p]]}}>> or
<<{{No ancestors}}>> if there is no ancestor of [[p]] in the family tree, or
<<{{[[p]] not found in the tree}}>> if [[p]] is not in the family tree

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In this challenge, players will embark on an adventurous journey through the family tree. Given a list of familial relationships represented as strings, your task is to identify the most ancient ancestor of a specified individual.
Input
Line 1: an integer n for the number of relationships
Next n lines: a single relationship relation, formatted as parent => child1,...,childN
Next line:The name p of the person whose most distant ancestor we aim to find.
Output
ancestor is the most distant ancestor of p or
No ancestors if there is no ancestor of p in the family tree, or
p not found in the tree if p is not in the family tree
Constraints
Each individual is represented as a single uppercase letter
Example
Input
3
A => D,R,G
R => P,K
D => O,F
O
Output
A is the most distant ancestor of O
